feed.title: The Pro Developer Blog
feed.subtitle: Tips for software developers and engineers on programming, design, architecture, interviews and more

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.content:
Hi there!

This is the first post of the Pro Programmer Blog, hence the obligatory title.

I have 10+ years of experience in the software development industry and today I thought I might start my own blog to write about my experiences in the industry, and here we are.

This is my first attempt at blogging, the blog will definitely evolve during this journey.

I’ve already decided on some topics to write about and will start writing it after I am done with fixing the blog’s layout, so wish me luck!

Cheers!
entry.summary: Hi there! This is the first post of the Pro Programmer Blog, hence the obligatory title. I have 10+ years of experience in the software development industry and today I thought I might start my own blog to write about my experiences in the industry, and here we are.
